name: Audios Amigo
tagline: Say Adi√≥s Amigo to Windows volume mixer and say Hello to Audio's Amigo.
body:
### Control per-application volume on Windows using an Android device!

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7611406/20158262/54ca56ea-a6a7-11e6-983b-3093774df767.png)

Audio's Amigo provides a mobile interface for controlling per-application volume for every sound device connected to your Windows system. Requires a WIFI connection between your phone and computer.
